content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on notifying Veterans of potential eligibility for VR&E services, including
when to send notice of potential eligibility for VR&E services
when notice of potential eligibility is not required
enclosing appropriate forms in the disability award decision notice
, and
actions to take when the Veteran returns a completed application for VR&E services
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A - Veteran Readiness and Employment (VR&E) Eligibility
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A
